/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city.

The image is taken from the perspective of a car on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. It's as if you're driving down the street, taking in the sights and sounds of Beijing. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in this bustling city.
